items.title: Here's Why Boeing (BA) Gained But Lagged the Market Today
items.description: Boeing (BA) concluded the recent trading session at $168.56, signifying a +0.23% move from its prior day's close.

items.title: Boeing working with DOJ on revised plea deal in 737 MAX fraud case, CEO says
items.description: Boeing  is in discussions with the U.S. Department of Justice to reach a revised plea agreement in a criminal fraud case stemming from the planemaker's alleged misrepresentations to regulators about a key system on the 737 MAX, company CEO Kelly Ortberg said on Wednesday.  Ortberg said at a Senate hearing Boeing is in discussions with the Justice Department to come up with an alternate agreement after the initial deal was not accepted by a judge.

items.title: Boeing CEO Worries That Trade War Could Hurt Its Exports
items.description: Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg said he is concerned that new U.S. tariffs could cause trade war escalations that jeopardize the jet maker’s exports.  The aerospace giant exports about 80% of the commercial airplanes it builds.  “Free trade is very important to us,” Ortberg said Wednesday, when asked to address tariffs during a Senate hearing on safety.

items.title: Don't Bet on a Boeing Stock Rebound Just Yet
items.description: Boeing stock is one of the worst to own in April, historically

items.title: Ryanair Issues Impressive Traffic Numbers for March 2025
items.description: RYAAY's March 2025 load factor of 93% remained flat on a year-over-year basis.
